word: Among the general laborers advertised to attend were Elder O. A. Olsen, president of the General Conference; Mrs. Ellen G. White; and some brethren whom the Mission Board were sending over from America to supplement the small force of workers in the Australian field. The promise of ample help led Elder Daniells to add to his appeal the words, "This will be a rare occasion,--one which we may not have again for years,--and we truly hope that but few of our people will be denied the privilege of being present." [BIBLE ECHO, OCT. 1, 1893, P. 320.]
